greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of positive integers k, where k <= n and gcd(k,2n+1) = gcd(k+1,2n+1).
comment: Note that whenever gcd(k,2n+1) = gcd(k+1,2n+1), this common value must be 1. - _David Wasserman_, May 13 2003
program: (MATLAB) function m = A070555(n) m = 0; for k = 1:(2*n + 1) if gcd(k, 2*n + 1) == gcd(k + 1, 2*n + 1) m = m + k; end end
results.author: _Vladeta Jovovic_, Apr 29 2002
